column5: This is how it would work out
No Problem.. I can handle that also... and food

I worked at Home Depot for 2 years. And built a lot of customers decks while I was there! Even though we weren't supposed to, they really didn't like that. Thats kind of the reason why i'm not there anymore haha. But one thing I know for sure, the program skeeter is talking about is a great program and a really bad program, some of the people there arent very good with it. but when they give you the quote, usually cut your cost and materials by about 40%-50%.

If you decide to goto home depot for a design, ask for ken leach at the pro desk, he's a friggen guru. and get him to draw you one up and give you a list of materials. and then buy your materials from turkstra.

Boy am I in Trouble now. Wife decided seeing as how I have put off building a new front porch on the house. NOW is the time to do it... Told her I will start in 2 weeks..  I know she will want it done before we start going to the trailer in June and before I can get into some fishing..   What to do??????

strain a rotator cuff?   might not be able to cast but trolling and jigging would be good therapy - and you could use the recovery time on the water to draw your plans up. You know you cant start a project that big without mapping it out first
say what the heck time to build the deck....   Art
could tell her the guy that issues permits is off on holidays for 3 weeks...  ..or just get off thy ass and make her happy bud!
Send your wife off to a spa for a weekend, Hire a guy to do the work. And you go . All you have to say is TA DA
Now thats a great idea  If ya can pull it off

order everything you need, incl. food and drinks and hold a deck building party but the beers start at the end (so it get's done and it's level).  still send her out so she doesn't know how many people helped and doesn't have to put up with the noise all day.  then because you got it done so quick and she's happy with it you have a free pass for fishing in your pocket on a boys weekend when ever you need it...  or fake an injury..
buy new house with existing deck

I tried that a while ago Wayne.. was suppose to do it last fall but forgot :sleeping_02:No she said it is time to get her done and then I can go Fishing.. got to start taking measurements so I can get the wood ordered.. Got to keep her happy or
Vince you know what she is like.. Spa deal out.. spend money on Deck the can fish.. Don't want to waste she will tell me
That part is no problem.. 2nd part is   She will do it
Im just waying in some options for ya

Well get the measurements and tell her everywhere is out of wood lol and you have to wait 1 week for it then when the weeks over tell her the are still waiting lol. I know it's a bit far out there but hope she doesn't know about wood.
decks are fun to build...get at er and before you know it ...youll be fishing and having BBQs on the new outdoor entertainment area...then you can tell her you need a new big ass BBQ

Take the measurments of the size of porch you want , then go to home depot and have them show you some different plans on there computer program.(This program is FREE) Pick the one you like then the computer tells you every thing you need to build it. Wood , screws,spacing,supports ect.........  You can build it!  Or you could hire me to build it for you!!!!
He (skeeter) works for good noodles.   (you pay NOW!   ) I mean it, much like Big Cliff has a dock party, have an OFC deck/porch party.
"i need to get some ideas for the design and my only way of brainstorming is being out on the lake or at the side of the river"
Let me know if you need a hand. I can free up some time. Just built a nice deck for a customer of mine 3 weeks ago.

More and more women are joining the trades....set out a community college course calendar for the first available carpentry program with the date circled. Place it next to Oprah's magazine....forget the name...where women are constantly affirming themselves....
hahaha that would make Al Bundy proud.  I do NOT recommend this!! haha
Don't need a new BBQ... Got a Green Egg on the back porch that is also a smoker.. Just in case you might not have heard of it..
Thanks for the offer how many brown bottles do we need
Thanks for the offer might just take you up on it also
you will need at least 2 craft's of fresh Tim's before a beer hit's his lips.
